body.caption: 15.04, Tree Iteration IV:

body.value: Differentiate between consumables and skills and items. (@rwarnking)

body: This originated from [Dota 2](https://store.steampowered.com/app/570/Dota_2/) where you have comsumable and non consumable items and skills. To clarify it might be usefull to add a clear definition and differentiation.

body.value: New Tag?: equipment (neben skilltree) (resource management equipment, aber misc skilltree in eigene struktur) (@HendrikBrueckler)

body.body: We decided to add _mng: materials_ to account for games in which the player uses resorces to obtain persitant gain. This does for example include building games in which resouces are used to buy or build buildings. We also decided to split _mng: skills and items_ into two seperate tags and add a tag for managing inventory space.
Based on the discussion of the 16.10.2024 this issue was closed without follow up issue.
